scripts.build-lib: cd shared-library & npm run build & cd ..
scripts.build-backend: cd shared-backend & npm install & npm run build & cd ..
scripts.build-service: cd admin-service & npm install & npm run build & cd ..
scripts.build-all: npm run build-lib & npm run build-backend & npm run build-service & cd ..
scripts.test-all: npm run build-all & cd shared-backend & npm run test
